WorkItem.ClosedComment: I have fixed this issue for the next release, please see the patch notes for commit # 35973
WorkItem.Description:
Currently in RAWR, no matter what options I use, no matter wich gear I choose the avoidance isn't being calculated correctly nor weighted correctly.
Â 
Comparing Avoidance-Values from 2.1 to 2.2 or even ingame-values I loose around 20% overal (10% dodge / 8% parry) wich shouldn't be correct.

Comments.Message: I used an ugly method to make ProtWarr use the new avoidance values but didn't have time to do accurate testing. Once the ProtWarr dev submits a fix we'll have it for next version. I'm also trying to figure it out in the interim.
